summary: This mod adds a buyable book about the locations of the Stones of Barenziah.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=darkorange]\"Stones of Barenziah Locations\" by UluEgo[/color][/size]

[color=darkorange]A: Description[/color]
This simple mod adds a buyable book about the locations of the Stones of Barenziah to the Riverwood Trader. It may be an alternative solution for the ones who have some various bugs with the mod of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9385]Stones of Barenziah Quest Markers[/url] by toaDime.

If you want the retexture of the stones as seen in the image, I recommend [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5261]Barenziahs Crappy Box[/url] by DW420.

As a note, I copied and summarized the information from [url=http://uk.ign.com/wikis/the-elder-scrolls-5-skyrim/Stones_of_Barenziah]IGN[/url].

[color=darkorange]B: Version History[/color]
> ver 1.1: The mod has been updated for the Patch 1.4 and above.
> ver 1.0: Initial Release

[color=darkorange]C: My Mods[/color]
> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15634]Soul of Skyforge[/url]
> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13274]Stones of Barenziah Locations[/url]
> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10374]Vampire Blood[/url]
> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9793]Prettier Aela[/url]
> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9597]Prettier Ysolda[/url]
> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8969]Infinite Night Eye for Khajiits and Dark Elves[/url]
> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8911]Rich Belethor[/url]
> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7680]Deadric Blade of Woe[/url]
> [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6967]Better Enchantments for Stealth Players[/url]
> [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6898]Nightingale Enchantment[/url]

[color=darkorange]D: Additional Information[/color]
> To install the mod, extract the \"zip\" file and place it in your \"...\\Data\\\" folder. Run it while you are launching the game.
> If you endorse the mod, I would be grateful.
author: UluEgo
